problem.markdown:
>>I best describe myself as:<< [x] A researcher looking to conduct randomized controlled trials using the ASSISTments TestBed. [x] I feel this could be a useful tool, but I'm not sure what it is or how to use it. [X] An educator looking to understand how this tool can benefit my classroom. [x] Attending the 2016 L@S conference to present my own paper, and I'm just browsing other work. [x] None of the above.
[explanation] Thank you for providing a little bit of information about your expectations of our Demonstration! [explanation]

checkboxgroup.label: I best describe myself as:
checkboxgroup.choice: A researcher looking to conduct randomized controlled trials using the ASSISTments TestBed.
I feel this could be a useful tool, but I'm not sure what it is or how to use it.
An educator looking to understand how this tool can benefit my classroom.
Attending the 2016 L@S conference to present my own paper, and I'm just browsing other work.

div.p: Thank you for providing a little bit of information about your expectations of our Demonstration!
